user_query: I'm a journalist working on a news story about the impact of global recession on different countries. Can you fetch me specific news articles about recession from The Guardian? Additionally, provide me with articles from Reuters Business and Financial News about the same topic.

TaskList.description: Fetch news articles related to the global recession from The Guardian.
Fetch news articles related to the global recession from Reuters Business and Financial News.
Compile and summarize the fetched articles from both The Guardian and Reuters.
